original_text: I said to the leaders, the officers and all the people, ‘It is hard work and the wall is very long. So we are not working near to each other.
korean_text: 내가 귀족들과 민장들과 남은 백성에게 이르기를 이 공사는 크고 넓으므로 우리가 성에서 떨어져 거리가 먼즉

sentences.original_text: the officers and all the people
and the wall is very long
So we are not working near to each other
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 우리는 서로 가까이서 일하지 않고 있습니다
